about_the_game:
We are making the worlds COOLEST Helicopter Game.

Your helicopter was built from the ground up for one purpose- fun. EVAC takes every opportunity it can to deliver a satisfying flying experience right to your personal computer. Every sound is custom made to deliver sweet audible candy straight to your eardrums.

  • Perilous rescue missions.

  • Nail-biting stealth operations.

  • Explosive and Tactical Action.

WE NEED YOU, PILOT! Our ground forces are constantly getting themselves into dangerous situations. Whether it's an intense firefight, a friendly casualty, or a lost squad, it's your job to find them and bring them home.

  • Rescue your fellow army men as they call you from the front line.

  • Fly below the radar to avoid complete and total obliteration.

  • Return in time for evening chow.

Prove your skills as the greatest pilot the RAGING ISLE has ever known. The lower you fly, the faster you go. The mountains, valleys, jungles, and deserts of the Raging Isle make for perfect flight paths that serve as rites of passage for aspiring pilots. Complete each mission under the challenge time to earn valuable rewards- then, push your throttle to the max and break your own records.

  • Low-flying grants an extreme speed-boost.

  • Smooth-flying maintains tremendous momentum.

  • Slow flying gets you nowhere.

Unleash a HYPER-LETHAL arsenal of heavy and experimental weaponry to eliminate thousands of hostile forces. Explosions so satisfying it'll turn grandma into a pyromaniac. Heavy Machine Guns, Rocket Pods, Auto-Cannons, and weapons that don't even belong on a helicopter...

  • Each weapon has a unique place in the sandbox; variety is the spice of life.

  • Different missions call for different tactics, equip your weapons accordingly.

  • Armored targets require heavier firepower to take down. Don't miss.

Earn PROMOTION POINTS to unlock a variety of powerful weapons, each a unique representation of the pilot who wields it. Unlocking new weapons means unlocking new ways to play, new opportunities to complete missions faster and more efficiently- whether it’s with lock-on missiles, high-caliber tank cannons, or experimental tech the military would rather keep classified.

  • Complete missions efficiently to earn bonus rewards.

  • Find collectibles and secrets to fill your pockets.

  • Unlock an arsenal of deadly weapons to protect your troops with.

Discover Raging Isle, a tropical island paradise isolated from the rest of the planet for millions of years. Soar over towering mountains, dense jungles, vast deserts, and frozen tundras. Take on challenging missions across this vast landscape, all at your own pace.

  • Ginormous open world, filled with secrets.

  • Day-night cycle with gorgeous sunsets.

  • A hand crafted paradise, for you to explore.

name: EVAC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Dual-Core 64-bit Intel or AMD processor, 2.0 GHZ CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 11 compatible video card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: EVAC is a retro-styled flight simulator where you pilot an old-school helicopter through a variety of perilous missions. Master high-speed, low-altitude races, engage in intense combat, and execute daring rescue operations. We need you, Pilot.
